import { CButton, CForm, CFormInput, CFormLabel, CFormTextarea, CTable, CTableBody, CTableDataCell, CTableHead, CTableHeaderCell, CTableRow } from '@coreui/react' import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function SingleIncident() { return (
  • Admin Dashboard
  • Reported Incidents
  • Logout
Incident Details
Title
Description
Severity/Priority
Status
) } export default SingleIncident
